column5: http://www.futureshop.ca/en-CA/product/id/10203385.aspx?icmp=non-core-homepage_DOTD_en  Anyone have any experience with this?  Cheap baitcasters usually mean birdsnests all day long, but im wondering if anyone has actually used this line.
At first I thought you posted the wrong link...but future shop does indeed sell this.  Can't help you out but very curious to find out more
